item.title: Welcome to the Practical Pisces (a blog mostly about fish and science)
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
Well hello!

Welcome to the Cramer Fish Sciences data science blog, the product of a handful of nerds at Cramer Fish Sciences. We’re here to share things about fish, fish science, coding, data visualization, and statistics.

Myfanwy will be the one who can’t stop talking about fishy viz (visualization of fish data). Travis likes to think and write about simulation models and R workflows for fish sciences. Kevin is actually a tree geek, but we let him talk about fish sometimes. Kai knows the best way to do everything (he specializes in optimization modeling).

Thanks for stopping by!
